TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RenderNode extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class RenderNode Inherits Object
public ref class RenderNode sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: RenderNode is used to build hardware accelerated rendering hierarchies.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the RenderNode, used for debugging purpose. May be null.
Docs.summary: Creates a new RenderNode that can be used to record batches of drawing operations, and store / apply render properties when drawn.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public: property float Alpha { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the translucency level of this display list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AmbientShadowColor As Integer
public: property int AmbientShadowColor { int get(); };

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: The shadow color set by #setAmbientShadowColor(int), or black if nothing was set

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Graphics.RecordingCanvas BeginRecording() cil managed

Docs.summary: Same as #beginRecording(int, int) with the width & height set to the RenderNode's own width & height.
Docs.returns: A canvas to record drawing operations.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Graphics.RecordingCanvas BeginRecording (int width, int height);
.method public hidebysig instance class Android.Graphics.RecordingCanvas BeginRecording(int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
Public Function BeginRecording (width As Integer, height As Integer) As RecordingCanvas
public: Android::Graphics::RecordingCanvas ^ BeginRecording(int width, int height);

Docs.param: The width of the recording viewport. This will not alter the width of the RenderNode itself, that must be set with #setPosition(Rect).
The height of the recording viewport. This will not alter the height of the RenderNode itself, that must be set with #setPosition(Rect).
Docs.summary: Starts recording a display list for the render node.
Docs.returns: A canvas to record drawing operations.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Public Function SetAmbientShadowColor (color As Color) As Boolean

Docs.param: The color this RenderNode will cast for its elevation shadow.

Public Function SetCameraDistance (distance As Single) As Boolean

Docs.param: The distance in pixels, must always be positive
Docs.summary: Sets the distance along the Z axis (orthogonal to the X/Y plane on which RenderNodes are drawn) from the camera to this RenderNode.

Public Function SetUseCompositingLayer (forceToLayer As Boolean, paint As Paint) As Boolean
public: bool SetUseCompositingLayer(bool forceToLayer, Android::Graphics::Paint ^ paint);

Docs.param: if true this forces the RenderNode to use an intermediate buffer. Default & generally recommended value is false.

The blend mode, alpha, and ColorFilter to apply to the compositing layer. Only applies if forceToLayer is true. The paint's alpha is multiplied with #getAlpha() to resolve the final alpha of the RenderNode. If null then no additional composition effects are applied on top of the composition layer.
Docs.summary: Controls whether or not to force this RenderNode to render to an intermediate buffer.
Docs.returns: True if the value changed, false if the new value was the same as the previous value.
